name: TX 4/20 mA 600-035
description: The 4/20mA LoRa sensor allows you to connect an analog 4/20mA probe (not included with the sensor). The signal generated by your 4/20mA probe will be read by the sensor and then sent via LoRa radio. This sensor can be used in many use cases and applications such as: pressure measurement, level measurement, measurement of extreme temperatures, any other use that can be managed by a 4/20mA sensor.
author: Akenza AG
